description: Number of divisors of p-1, p prime.
comments: Also the number of irreducible factors of Phi(p,x)-1, for cyclotomic polynomial Phi(p,x) and prime p. The formula is Phi(p,x)-1 = x Prod {n>1, n|p-1} Phi(n,x). - _T. D. Noe_, Oct 17 2003
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Cyclotomic Polynomial
maple: for i from 1 to 500 do if isprime(i) then print(tau(i-1)); fi; od;A008328 := proc(n)        numtheory[tau](ithprime(n)-1) ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 30 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
